channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- EPMM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- EPMM

item.title: CVE-2024-36131|2024-08-21T17:22:15.126Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An insecure deserialization vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows an authenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system of the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-36132|2024-08-07T15:10:11.847Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: Insufficient verification of authentication controls in EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote attacker to bypass authentication and access sensitive resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-34788|2024-08-07T15:25:23.493Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote malicious user to access potentially sensitive information

item.title: CVE-2024-36131|2024-08-07T03:54:46.888Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An insecure deserialization vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows an authenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system of the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-36132|2024-08-07T03:54:46.880Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: Insufficient verification of authentication controls in EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote attacker to bypass authentication and access sensitive resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-34788|2024-08-07T03:54:46.826Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote malicious user to access potentially sensitive information

item.title: CVE-2024-36130|2024-08-07T03:54:47.818Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An insufficient authorization vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows an unauthorized attacker within the network to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system of the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-22026|2024-08-01T22:35:34.550Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated local user to bypass shell restriction and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2023-46807|2024-06-04T17:22:20.190Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability in web component of EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated user with appropriate privilege to access or modify data in the underlying database.

item.title: CVE-2023-46806|2024-06-04T17:22:17.015Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability in a web component of EPMM versions before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated user with appropriate privilege to access or modify data in the underlying database.

item.title: CVE-2024-22026|2024-05-22T22:55:11.219Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated local user to bypass shell restriction and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-22026|2024-07-23T16:31:37.742Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated local user to bypass shell restriction and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2023-46806|2024-08-02T20:53:21.862Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability in a web component of EPMM versions before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated user with appropriate privilege to access or modify data in the underlying database.

item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability in web component of EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated user with appropriate privilege to access or modify data in the underlying database.

item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote malicious user to access potentially sensitive information
